name: Io
title: Wisp
lore: Io is a fundamental force of the universe, an amalgam of pure energy. It seeks out other beings to bond with.

tether.name: Tether
tether.description: Links Io to an allied unit, sharing regeneration and granting movement speed.

spirits.name: Spirits
spirits.description: Summons spirits that rotate around Io, damaging enemies they pass through.

overcharge.name: Overcharge
overcharge.description: Io channels energy, draining HP and mana but granting attack speed and damage reduction.

relocate.name: Relocate
relocate.description: Teleports Io and a tethered ally to any location on the map. Returns after a delay.
